title: George R.R. Martin's Skin Trade 001 (2013) (4 Covers) (Darkness-
description:
English | CBR | 28 Pages

Skin Trade #1
Publisher:  Avatar Press
Publication Date:  July 10, 2013

Story:  George R.R. Martin
Sequential Adaptation:  Daniel Abraham
Artwork and covers:  Mike Wolfer
Colors:  Digikore Studios
Letterer:  Kurt Hathaway

GEORGE RR MARTIN returns to comics with Skin Trade, the World Fantasy Award winning story that combines Martin's unique creative voice into a powerful vision of horror! Private investigator, Randi Wade sees the ravaged remains of innocent victims that have been savagely murdered and skinned. As the mysterious secrets of the Blackstone Manor begin to be uncovered, she gets ever closer to the monstrous truth...werewolves are real! George RR Martin combines his unmatched creative vision with the visceral illustrations of horror master Mike Wolfer to create something intensely unsettling.

Thanks goes to Darkness for this release.
